articles.author: Wired
articles.title: The US Is Storing Migrant Children’s DNA in a Criminal Database
articles.description: Customs and Border Protection has swabbed the DNA of migrant children as young as 4, whose genetic data is uploaded to an FBI-run database that can track them if they commit crimes in the future.
articles.content: The United States government has collected DNA samples from upwards of 133,000 migrant children and teenagersincluding at least one 4-year-oldand uploaded their genetic data into a national criminal … [+3346 chars]

articles.title: 'Dept. Q' review: Matthew Goode is grumpy perfection in chilling crime drama
articles.description: In Netflix's 'Dept. Q,' based on the Danish crime novels, Matthew Goode stars as a troubled detective tasked with investigating cold cases. Read our review.

articles.author: Paul Reynolds
articles.title: Senior Kinahan figure on way to Ireland after extradition
articles.description: One of the most senior figures in the Kinahan Organised Crime Group, who is wanted in Ireland to face charges of murder and involvement with a criminal gang, has been extradited from the United Arab Emirates.

articles.title: Crypto crime spills over from behind the screen to real-life violence
